name: dropbox_brick
title: Dropbox Sync Tool
description: Adds Dropbox API functionality and user authentication to your GoodData project. This app allows you full access to scheduling, back up, space management, and many other useful import/export tools. For a complete list of the features available please visit www.dropbox.com/developers/sync.

parameters.name: dropbox_api_key
parameters.description: Path to file where to read the keys.
